helloMessage:
Hello! I'm {0}. Nice to meet you!
This is my events channel. Here I will post notifications for upcoming guild events!
 Some useful commands are:
 `{1} attend #` to sign up for event #
 `{1} leave #` to leave event #
 
 For all commands and more details type `{1} help`.
schedulerMessage: You can give roles special permissions with the `p? configure` command. Users with the discord administrator permission do not need additional permissions.
eventCreationFailed: Failed to schedule event. Maybe check `{} help` and try again.
eventRemovalFailed: Could not remove event. Maybe check `{} help` and try again.
attendFailed: Could not attend event. Are you already attending? Maybe check `{} help` and try again.
leaveFailed: Could not leave event. Have you already left? Maybee check `{} help` and try again
updateFailed: Could not update event. Maybe check `{} help` and try again.
commandError:
There was an error executing your command: `{}`
 If you belive this is a bug, please contact the admins.
confirmEventsChannel:
Are you sure you want to set this channel as the events channel?
**WARNING: THIS WILL DELETE ALL MESSAGES IN THIS CHANNEL.**
Reply with `yes/no`
eventTitle: Please enter a title for your event:
eventTime: Please give a date **and** time for your event (`e.g. June 15th at 13:00`). If a weekday is specified, the event will be set as recurring (e.g. `Fridays at 10:00`)
eventDesc: Enter a description for your event:
cannotCreateEventsChannel: I do not have permission to create my events channel. Please manually create a channel for events and set it as my channel with `{}configure`. Make sure I have permission to manage messages in my events channel.
cannotCreateSchedulerRole: I do not have permission to create roles. If you want certain users (other than ones with the `administrator` permission) to be able to manage events, please manually create a role called `Scheduler` and assign it to any users who should be able to manage events.
cannotManageMessages: I must have the `manage messages` permission in this channel to be able to register it as my events channel.
new_update: A new update is here! Check it out: https://professorcalculus.io/changelog
